Tha ks again mister !

You could use a free weather webservice like: http://www.worldweatheronline.com/free-weather-feed.aspx

It states that you can get the weather data + forecast

"for any location via postcode, zipcode or latitude and longitude"

Than just use some free weather icons (e.g.: http://www.iconarchive.com/show/oxygen-icons-by-oxygen-icons.org.18.html) as markers, tooltip with details, finished...

Pretty easy ;-)
